title: Villager
flavor: Here is some text to read while you wait to die.

title: Vigilante
action: Kill one person per game, during night.

title: Guilty Vigilante
action: Kill one person per game, during night.
effects: If you kill a town member you commit suicide.

title: Doctor
action: Save one person from one kill action per night.
notes: You cannot save the same person two nights in a row.

title: Blacksmith
action: Choose one person to hold your armor each night.
effects: Armor prevents one kill action one time. After this the armor is gone for the rest of the game.
notes: The Blacksmith will not know if their armor has been used and should give it out every night during the game.

title: Investigator
action: Check one person each night.
notes: Check may be for allegiance or role depending on moderator.

title: Parity Investigator
action: Check if two adjacent people have the same allegiance each night.

title: Bodyguard
action: Protect one person from one kill action each night.
effects: If your protection was used, both you and the killer are killed instead.
notes: If there are multiple killers, only one dies, which one is up to the moderator.

title: Escort
action: Block one person's night action each night.

title: Mayor
action: Reveal your role to make your vote worth two votes.

title: Retributionist
action: You may revive a dead person once per game, during night.
notes: When this card is in play, dead people must also close their eyes during night.

title: Tracker
action: Track one person at night to see who they visit

title: Trapper
action: You may setup one trap at one persons house during night, the first time that person is visited any night after the trap is set, the vistor dies.
effects: Setting a new trap removes any previously set trap
notes: If there are multiple visitors, only one dies, which one is up to the moderator.

title: Veteren
action: Go on alert at the beginning of a night, three times per game.
effects: While on alert you cannot be killed at night, and any visitors are shot.

title: Lookout
action: Check one person at the end of night to see who visited them

title: Mafia
flavor: Here is some text to read while you wait to kill people.

title: Blackmailer
action: Silence one person each night.
effects: A silenced person may not talk during the next day.

title: Framer
action: Choose one person to frame at night, if investigated, they will appear to be mafia.

title: Consigliere
action: Choose one person and check their exact role each night.

title: Consort
action: Block one person's night action each night.

title: Jester
action: After death you can kill one person during a night.
effects: Until he kills someone, the Jester is aligned with the town; afterwards he is aligned with the Mafia.

title: Jester (Traditional)
action: After being lynched you can kill one person who voted to lynch you during a night.
effects: In addition to other winners, the jester wins if he is lynched during the game.

title: Survivor
action: Put on a bulletproof vest at night, protecting you from one kill action.
effects: In addition to other winners, the survivor wins if he lives until the end of the game.

title: Executioner
notes: You are given a target at the beginning of the game, you must get them lynched. If your target dies during night you become a Jester (traditional).
effects: In addition to other winners, the executioner wins if his target is lynched.
